name: Soccer Skills Cup of World
description:
Soccer Skills is an amazing action packet soccer tournament game. 

You select your favorite country, prepare your team hard and try to win match after match as you go through the rounds, reach and win the quarter finals and semi finals to make it through to face the grand final of the championship!

Regardless of whether you call it soccer or football, you’ll love this challenging fast paced soccer game. It will put you right in the middle of the action and bring out your top skills.

It is an entirely simulated soccer match in 3D that includes throw-ins, corner kicks, fouls and penalties and while it may lack a bit in graphics it definitely compensates in its phenomenal game play!

Enjoy playing this game!
